title: President appoints 17 member cabinet
body_lines: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa today named 17 members to the cabinet dropping most seniors and appointing younger members in an attempt to calm growing public anger over the worsening economic situation in the country.
Three of the most vociferous supporters of the  government Johnson Fernando, Mahindanabda Aluthgamage and Rohitha Abeygunawardena were dropped from the cabinet while retaining only four seniors.
These include Dinesh Gunawardena, Prasanna Ranatunga, Douglas Devananda and Dr. Ramesh Pathirana.
1. Dinesh Gunawardena – Public Administration, Internal Affairs, Provincial Councils & Local Government.
